description: If you need to back up, transfer, or edit your save data, you will likely encounter the JKR file. For example, if you experience issues with your save file, you might need to restore it from a backup or edit it to correct certain settings.
Balantro creates JKR files in one of three folders (named 1, 2, or 3) to store save progress. For example, Balantro may create a JKR file in folder 1 in the following location:

common_filenames.description: save.jkr - Default filename given to JKR files.
